trans-unit.source: A class that serializes a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> instance to and from RSS 2.0 format.

Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and to create instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> from XML documents that represent RSS 2.0 feeds.
If you have derived a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and want to serialize it, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter%601> formatter.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter"></xref> class.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> to serialize.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to specify a class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> to instantiate when a syndication feed is read in.
The instance derived from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> to be serialized.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> instance.

If the `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, all elements defined in the Atom 1.0 specification that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification are serialized with in the Atom 1.0 namespace.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> to serialize.
A value that specifies whether to serialize elements that are defined in the Atom 1.0 specification but not in the RSS 2.0 specification.
The default value is `true`.
Verifies whether the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> contains a valid RSS 2.0 syndication feed.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
A value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> contains a valid RSS 2.0 syndication feed.
Creates a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref>.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> instance.

The instance derived from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter"></xref> instance.

The instance derived from <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter"></xref> instance.
Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
The default value of this property is `true`.
Attribute extensions are XML attributes that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification.
This property determines whether to write these attributes during serialization.

Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown attributes inside the `AttributeExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 feed.
A value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
The default value of this property is `true`.
Element extensions are XML elements that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification.
This property determines whether to write these elements during serialization.

Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown elements inside the `ElementExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 feed.
A value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
Reads an RSS 2.0 syndication feed from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> instance.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
Reads a syndication item from <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> instance using the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> instance.

The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance is not added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> used to create the new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instance.
A new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instance.
Reads in a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instances from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.

The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instances are not added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> instance to use to create the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instances.
A value that specifies whether all of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instances have been read from the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> instance.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instances.
Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.
The default value of this property is `true`.

When this property is `true`, any properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> class that cannot be represented in the RSS 2.0 format are serialized within the Atom 1.0 namespace otherwise these properties are not serialized.
A value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.
Sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> instance associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter"></xref>.
Gets the syndication version used by the formatter.
[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] supports Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0 syndication versions.
The syndication version used by the formatter.
Writes the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instance to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
Override this method to change the way a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> is written.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> to write.
The base URI for the feed.
Writes a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instances to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
Override this method to change the way a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> objects.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem"></xref> instances to write.
The base URI for the feed.

Writes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema"></xref> method.
Override this method to return your own schema.
`Null`.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)"></xref> method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> to read from.
Implements the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)"></xref> method.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to write to.
